original_title: Ken Russell: Portrait of a Maverick
overview: Writer, musician and filmmaker Chris Wade explores the life and career of legendary movie director KEN RUSSELL, one of cinema's most innovative and daring figures. Featuring new interviews with his son Xavier, and collaborators Judith Paris, Emma Millions and Scott Antony, this is a warm homage to a true maverick, a man who did things his way, while refusing to compromise his unique vision.
title: Ken Russell: Portrait of a Maverick
